title: PubMed Search Strategy Workshop for Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: PubMed search skills training for learners in teacher roles, emphasizing practical application in educational settings with VR-simulated interactive search environments

learning_goals: Learners can search for literature relevant to specific clinical questions with 80% accuracy using PubMed advanced search operators.
Learners can select at least three appropriate papers by applying criteria for evaluating search results (e.g., level of evidence, publication year).
Learners can revise search strategies based on peer feedback and demonstrate improved search cases twice or more in a VR environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
